:x: Thank you for all the interest! This position has been filled. :x:

I'm looking for a freelance developer who can help us incorporate the requests outlined below into the members-only section of our website.
• This project-based position is remote. _Ideally, we'd prefer a candidate based in the US or Canada._   
• _Hiring Company_: Pritikin ICR 
• _Point of contact_: Those interested should email Ashley Medina at <mailto:icr-marketing@pritikin.com|icr-marketing@pritikin.com>
_*Background*_
Our corporate website (<http://pritikinicr.com|pritikinicr.com>) has a public-facing blog (<https://pritikinicr.com/powered-by-pritikin-blog-and-company-news>).

Additionally, we have a members-only section of our website (<http://providers.pritikinicr.com|providers.pritikinicr.com>) which is visible exclusively to our clients. We would like to add a recipe blog (_The Pritikin Kitchen_) to this member-only site.

_*Note: Our website, existing blog, and members-only site were built using the <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/website/thrifty-theme-by-juice-tactics-snacks|Thrifty HubSpot theme>. The new recipe blog should be built using our Thrifty child theme._

_*Scope of Work*_
1. Developing the blog listing page for _The Pritikin Kitchen_.
2. Developing a recipe card module for _The Pritikin Kitchen_.
3. Formatting the printable version of the recipe card module, which would be generated as a .pdf through a “Print Recipe” button.  <https://providers.pritikinicr.com/hubfs/Document%20Links/Resource%20Hub/Print%20Recipe%20Example%20-%20Grilled%20Balsamic%20Vegetable%20Skewers.pdf|Desired formatting>.
_*Visual Examples*_
_The Pritikin Kitchen_ blog should mirror the visual style of our corporate website, with the layout and functionality of a food blog.
• _Style attributes which should be carried over from our corporate website,_ <https://pritikinicr.com/>_:_
    ◦ _No 90° angles_
    ◦ _Matching fonts_
    ◦ _Same color family_
• Blog listing page and recipe card module _layout and functionality_ example: <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/website/foodie-theme-by-stephanie-o-gay-garcia> (_Unfortunately, Stephanie didn't have the bandwidth to work on this project_) 
If you'd be interested, please email me (Ashley Medina) at <mailto:icr-marketing@pritikin.com|icr-marketing@pritikin.com>, I look forward to working with you!
